channel.description: Recent content in Arts on Darius Wieczorek DEL-ART

item.title: Drawings
item.description: Drawing for me is the analytical part of creative work, it is a record of the process of thoughts. The sketchiness of the drawing is not a bad feature. As the art is not a higher level of a craft, the photographic feature of the image is not paramount to the drawing study or a picture.

item.title: Cross-eye Stereoscopy
item.description: Cross-eyed stereoscopic imagery is the simplest technique to experience the esthetic of the spatial perception.

item.title: Painting
item.description: My painting is usually executed in oil or acrylic, and painting sketches in watercolor or temper (acrylic temper). As my biggest interest is in visual perception, I lean towards impressionist, post-impressionist, but generally, realistic art, though I am very inspired by the subjective, individualistic, and expressionistic approach.

item.title: Z-Depth based Steroscopy
item.description: I was quite surprised to learn 3D video editing methods by converting source footage using depth maps. But in fact, it became obvious that this method is effective and, above all, gives great control over the editing process as perfecting the visual storytelling.

item.title: 3D laser cut acrylic model
item.description: The spatial structure, composed of acrylic plates engraved with outlines of hands playing the harp strings.

item.title: Digital illustrations for Gestalt, psychology magazine
item.description: Illustrations for Gestalt Magazine are digital collages created from photos, scans, traditional and digital drawings and ink paintings.

item.title: Drawings: Visual Elements for Graphic Design
item.description: The drawing is the basis for any genre of art or a visual form of expression. It is very advantageous to use sketches and drawings in the design phase as well as in the final product.

item.title: Optical Illusion
item.description: Optical illusion is a meaningful manifestation of our perception, illustration of most basic phenomena. It is the opening of our thought on the proces of development, and consequently enabling deep reflection on cognitive abilities and worldview foundations. Visual perception is the source and opportunity to develop and work on experiences that are very close, intimate, and subjective, easily accessible to our reflection, and at the same time those are sensations common and available for everybody interested.
